title: Second window comes to front when using first
OB: When switching from another application to one Eclipse window and clicking on a docked view or perspective, the other window comes to the front, covering my other applications' windows.
EB: I expect that when I switch from another application to one Eclipse window and click on a docked view or perspective, the window I interacted with should come to the front, not the other window. The other applications' windows should remain unaffected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open two Eclipse windows. 
2. Switch from another application to one of the Eclipse windows. 
3. Click on a docked view or perspective in the active Eclipse window. 
4. Observe that the other Eclipse window comes to the front, covering the windows of other applications.
